titleStmt.title: A few plain reasons why a Protestant of the Church of England should not turn Roman Catholick by a real Catholick of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, Thomas, 1607-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Barlow, Bishop of Lincoln, by Wing.
Imperfect: "Postscript" (p. 51-53) signed: N.N. lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
